video.title: New Girl
video.synopsis: Still rebounding from a breakup, Jessica Day moves in with three single guys, all of whom are ready to help her understand the ways of the world.

episodes.synopsis: After breaking up with her two-timing beau, schoolteacher Jess Day moves in with three single males: a bartender, a womanizer and a personal trainer.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Schmidt help Jess get her things out of her ex's apartment. Later, Jess meets new roomie Winston, who's back from playing basketball abroad.
episodes.title: Kryptonite

episodes.synopsis: Fearful that he'll run into his ex-girlfriend at a wedding, Nick asks Jess to be his date. Meanwhile, Winston takes his role as an usher seriously.
episodes.title: Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Jess accidentally walks in on Nick naked, sending his self-confidence to an all-time low -- just after a pretty co-worker agrees to go out with him.
episodes.title: Naked

episodes.synopsis: Cece convinces Jess that Nick wants to be more than friends with her, and Schmidt tries to seal the deal with Cece.
episodes.title: Cece Crashes

episodes.synopsis: Things go horribly awry when Jess invites a music teacher -- whom she's always has had a crush on -- to the gang's Thanksgiving dinner at the loft.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Jess becomes jealous when Winston joins her handbell quartet and instantly steals the limelight with his natural ability.
episodes.title: Bells

episodes.synopsis: When Jess decides to take her relationship with Paul to the next level, she asks the guys for sex advice.
episodes.title: Bad in Bed

episodes.synopsis: The gang attends Schmidt's holiday office party, and Jess frets when she receives an expensive gift from Paul.
episodes.title: The 23rd

episodes.synopsis: Jess steps in when Schmidt's plans for his birthday party fall apart. Meanwhile, Nick begins dating a pretty lawyer who's hiding a secret.
episodes.title: The Story of the 50

episodes.synopsis: Nick panics when Julia doesn't want to put a label on their relationship. Meanwhile, Julia consents to help Jess get out of a traffic ticket.
episodes.title: Jess and Julia

episodes.synopsis: Against Nick's wishes, Jess makes it her mission to get the loft's crabby landlord to like her, inadvertently jeopardizing their living situation.
episodes.title: The Landlord

episodes.synopsis: Jess persuades Schmidt to be her wingman as she sets out to have a casual fling with a handsome stranger on Valentine's Day.
episodes.title: Valentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: Jess finds herself the target of a classroom bully. Meanwhile, Nick goes into a tailspin when Julia sends him a cactus.
episodes.title: Bully

episodes.synopsis: When Nick gets hurt playing touch football and Jess discovers he doesn't have insurance, she takes him to her doctor friend -- who's a gynecologist.
episodes.title: Injured

episodes.synopsis: After realizing that Schmidt is doing all the housework, Jess pushes him to go on strike -- and the loft's entire ecosystem gets thrown off balance.
episodes.title: Control

episodes.synopsis: Jess reluctantly dates the wealthy father of one of her students. Meanwhile, Schmidt and Winston become ultracompetitive while playing bar trivia.
episodes.title: Fancyman, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jess's date with Russell doesn't go as planned. Meanwhile, Nick's college friend visits and brings out Nick's inner frat boy.
episodes.title: Fancyman, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Cece has been keeping a secret from Jess, which creates a rift between them when Jess finds out. Meanwhile, Nick has trouble juggling two women.
episodes.title: Secrets

episodes.synopsis: A nervous Jess invites Russell to spend the weekend at the loft, and her fears mount when he gets along better with the guys than she'd hoped.
episodes.title: Normal

episodes.synopsis: Jess babysits Russell's preteen daughter for the weekend and meets his ex-wife. Meanwhile, a pregnancy scare sends Schmidt and Cece into panic mode.
episodes.title: Kids

episodes.synopsis: Unwilling to admit her true feelings for Schmidt, Cece encourages him to go on a date with one of her beautiful roommates.
episodes.title: Tomatoes

episodes.synopsis: The gang fears that Jess and Nick may backslide into romantic relationships when they bump into their exes.
episodes.title: Backslide

episodes.synopsis: One of the roommates decides to move out of the loft. Meanwhile, Winston faces his fear of the dark when the gang makes a trip to the desert.
episodes.title: See Ya

episodes.synopsis: Schmidt throws a "rebranding" party, where the newly unemployed Jess volunteers to be a shot girl alongside a jaded cocktail waitress.
episodes.title: Re-Launch

episodes.synopsis: Mistaken identity abounds as Jess unwittingly captures the attention of a beer delivery guy and then pretends to be a handsome stranger's blind date.
episodes.title: Katie

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Jess address their relationship-without-benefits, and Schmidt hopes to date a cute Republican by pretending to be one of Mitt Romney's sons.
episodes.title: Fluffer

episodes.synopsis: When a group of young neighbors moves in across the hall, Jess and Schmidt are determined to become friends with them.
episodes.title: Neighbors

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Cece have a huge fight about their life choices. Meanwhile, Schmidt and Nick argue over the rules of male friendship.
episodes.title: Models

episodes.synopsis: Jess gets hired as a zombie at a haunted house. Meanwhile, Schmidt's and Cece's Halloween costumes match -- but Winston's and Shelby's don't.
episodes.title: Halloween

episodes.synopsis: Jess's search for a new job gets intense. Meanwhile, her time of the month affects the guys, and Schmidt starts a relationship with his boss.
episodes.title: Menzies

episodes.synopsis: Jess enlists help for a "Parent Trap" scheme when her divorced parents visit for Thanksgiving. Meanwhile, Schmidt deals with his own family drama.
episodes.title: Parents

episodes.synopsis: Jess frets about her biological clock when a friend gets pregnant, while Nick and Winston seek inspiration at the zoo for Nick's zombie-themed novel.
episodes.title: Eggs

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Winston want to get a bathtub for the loft. Meanwhile, Schmidt must decide between his boss and Cece.
episodes.title: Bathtub

episodes.synopsis: While attending multiple holiday parties in one night, Jess tries to avoid Sam, and Nick tries to keep up with his adventurous date.
episodes.title: Santa

episodes.synopsis: Things go awry when Nick and Angie spend a weekend away with Jess and Sam. Meanwhile, Winston teaches Schmidt about race relations.
episodes.title: Cabin

episodes.synopsis: Jess tries to help Nick repair his relationship with his con-man father, but Nick worries that his dad is only using him in a scheme.
episodes.title: A Father's Love

episodes.synopsis: Nick suspects that one of Jess's night-school students is hiding something. Meanwhile, Winston and Cece have an embarrassing encounter.
episodes.title: Pepperwood

episodes.synopsis: During a guys' night out, Nick and Schmidt are attracted to the same woman. Meanwhile, Winston falls for a girl who doesn't return his affections.
episodes.title: Cooler

episodes.synopsis: Cece hopes to find a husband at a dating convention for East Indians, while Jess and Nick find themselves in a compromising position in front of Sam.
episodes.title: Table 34

episodes.synopsis: Schmidt finds a prime parking spot, which the roommates then fight over. Meanwhile, Winston looks for a condom after getting an invitation from Daisy.
episodes.title: Parking Spot

episodes.synopsis: Winston interviews a football player who's interested in Jess. Elsewhere, Nick and Schmidt plan a party to celebrate 10 years of being roommates.
episodes.title: Tinfinity

episodes.synopsis: After admitting how she feels about Nick, Jess learns that he may be hiding something. Elsewhere, Schmidt becomes preoccupied with buying a fish.
episodes.title: Quick Hardening Caulk

episodes.synopsis: After a death occurs in Nick's family, the gang travels with him to Chicago, where his friends help with funeral plans and meet his eccentric family.
episodes.title: Chicago

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Nick attempt to break out of relationship limbo by going on a date, but their romantic outing is sabotaged by Schmidt and Winston.
episodes.title: First Date

episodes.synopsis: While Jess throws a surprise bachelorette party for Cece, Nick and Winston take her fiancé out for a guys' night.
episodes.title: Bachelorette Party

episodes.synopsis: In a series of flashbacks, the gang shares stories about how each one lost his or her virginity.
episodes.title: Virgins

episodes.synopsis: Jess's dad visits at a bad time, forcing Nick to spend time alone with him. Meanwhile, Winston hopes someone will throw him a surprise birthday party.
episodes.title: Winston's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Nick make a decision about their relationship. Meanwhile, Schmidt and Winston plan to sabotage Cece's wedding.
episodes.title: Elaine's Big Day

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Jess flee to a Mexican beach to officially take the romantic plunge, but Nick finds himself on the wrong side of the law.
episodes.title: All In

episodes.synopsis: Jess makes the mistake of asking Nick for advice when she tries to make friends with a band of unfriendly teachers at her new school.
episodes.title: Nerd

episodes.synopsis: Schmidt is mistakenly invited on a double date with Jess and Nick, and there's a hitch in Winston's promise to get them a table at a hot new eatery.
episodes.title: Double Date

episodes.synopsis: Schmidt tries to sabotage Jess and Nick's relationship, and Winston gives his cat, Furguson, a night on the town before being neutered.
episodes.title: The Captain

episodes.synopsis: Jess secretly uses Nick's recent inheritance to pay his long-overdue bills, and Schmidt turns to a rabbi for help with life's big questions.
episodes.title: The Box

episodes.synopsis: Jess hosts a Halloween party, and the gang tries to cheer up Schmidt by posing online as his childhood hero, actor Michael Keaton.
episodes.title: Keaton

episodes.synopsis: Single once again, Coach moves back into the loft, where things have changed. Meanwhile, Jess and Cece meet an intriguing guy on a girls' night out.
episodes.title: Coach

episodes.synopsis: Bummed that she can't take her class to the beach, Jess takes out her anger on the Chinese restaurant whose menus are drowning the loft.
episodes.title: Menus

episodes.synopsis: Jess tries to distract Schmidt while Coach and Cece enjoy their first date; a bus driver sidetracks Nick and Winston as they search for Ferguson.
episodes.title: Longest Night Ever

episodes.synopsis: The group gets a lesson in roughing it when Jess and Nick decide they should celebrate Thanksgiving in the wilderness.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving III

episodes.synopsis: When Jess is given 20 minutes to decide whether to take a new job and give up teaching, the gang reflects on their own career choices.
episodes.title: Clavado En Un Bar

episodes.synopsis: Nick grows jealous when Jess and Coach bond over his basketball team's arch rivals, while Schmidt mentors a new employee and Winston starts a new job.
episodes.title: Basketsball

episodes.synopsis: Nick tries to plan the perfect birthday party for Jess. Meanwhile, Schmidt works overtime to help Cece, who's just started a new bartending job.
episodes.title: Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Cece are thrilled to be invited to a party at the home of music legend Prince, but of course the guys plan to crash the bash.
episodes.title: Prince

episodes.synopsis: Jessica teaches Nick how to be friends with his ex, and Coach borrows Schmidt's loft for a date that gets cut short ... by Schmidt and his own date.
episodes.title: Exes

episodes.synopsis: A visit from Jess's wild-child sister Abby brings disaster. Meanwhile, Nick serves as wingman when Schmidt crashes a bar mitzvah.
episodes.title: Sister

episodes.synopsis: A visit was one thing; now Jess's wild sister Abby plans to stay in L.A. Meanwhile, Winston waits too long to check his police academy test results.
episodes.title: Sister II

episodes.synopsis: When Abby moves in with Schmidt, Jess decides to move into Nick's bedroom, which doesn't work out well for either of them.
episodes.title: Sister III

episodes.synopsis: Jess hires Coach as a new volleyball coach; Schmidt asks Nick and Winston to represent him at a deposition when he gets sued.
episodes.title: Fired Up

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Nick examine their relationship, Cece drunk-texts Buster, and Schmidt, Winston and Coach try to impress their attractive new neighbors.
episodes.title: Mars Landing

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Nick struggle to keep news of their breakup from their friends, and Winston demands a party in honor of his acing the police academy exam.
episodes.title: Big News

episodes.synopsis: Jess thinks that somebody is trying to short-circuit her first dance as a middle school teacher, so she asks the gang to serve as chaperones.
episodes.title: Dance

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Nick invite everyone on a cruise that they had scheduled when they were still together, but Coach has a little problem with boats.
episodes.title: Cruise

episodes.synopsis: When the gang attends a wedding and each of them sets out to get lucky, Jess eyes the best man while Schmidt tries to talk Nick into a foursome.
episodes.title: The Last Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Schmidt helps Jess use a dating app. Nick, Cece and Coach are high on marijuana brownies when Winston invites them to a party with other LAPD cadets.
episodes.title: Dice

episodes.synopsis: Jess is shocked to learn her dad's new girlfriend is her old high school classmate and rival. The guys participate in Schmidt's product focus group.
episodes.title: Julie Berkman's Older Sister

episodes.synopsis: Jess tries to prove she's not shallow by dating a guy with a male endowment issue. Cece and Winston suggest to Coach and Schmidt they could be models.
episodes.title: Micro

episodes.synopsis: Just when Jess cracks down on dating among school staff, she gets the hots for a new teacher. The gang has a new home phone, and Nick plays secretary.
episodes.title: Landline

episodes.synopsis: Winston's police academy processing includes a background check and home search, so Jess's possession of an illegal substance just might be an issue.
episodes.title: Background Check

episodes.synopsis: Jess's new boyfriend seems threatened by Nick, so Nick pretends he's gay. Schmidt is dismayed when Cece contemplates breast reduction surgery.
episodes.title: Goldmine

episodes.synopsis: Jess is anxious about attending a weekend teachers' workshop with Ryan and Coach. Nick, Schmidt and Winston plan their idea of a wild guys' weekend.
episodes.title: Teachers

episodes.synopsis: With everyone single at Thanksgiving, Schmidt introduces "Bangsgiving," for which each person is to bring a friend to sleep over with another friend.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving IV

episodes.synopsis: An old argument resurfaces between Jess and Cece, and Schmidt's caught in the middle. Winston is suspicious of Nick's date, Tran's granddaughter Kai.
episodes.title: Girl Fight

episodes.synopsis: Stuck at the airport due to flight delays, the gang worries they'll end up home alone for the holidays. Jess, however, receives a special invitation.
episodes.title: LAXmas

episodes.synopsis: Jess urges Schmidt to use his political links to halt the night construction on their street. Nick and Coach are concerned about Winston's partner.
episodes.title: Shark

episodes.synopsis: Jess goes out of her way not to give Ryan preferential treatment now that the staff knows they're dating. Winston's obsessed with a good luck crystal.
episodes.title: Coming Out

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Schmidt collaborate on a business idea -- a suit made of sweatshirt material -- but need Jess's help in presenting it to an investor.
episodes.title: Swuit

episodes.synopsis: The gang's Valentine's Day pub crawl finds Nick dumped by Kai, Ryan asking Jess to move in with him, and Schmidt reconnecting emotionally with Cece.
episodes.title: The Crawl

episodes.synopsis: Jess revisits her past when she and the gang attend a wedding in her Oregon hometown. Ryan is a no-show for the trip, and Cece runs into an old crush.
episodes.title: Oregon

episodes.synopsis: Schmidt's fear of spiders forces everyone in the loft to hunt down an eight-legged visitor. Coach tries to compose an email asking May out on a date.
episodes.title: Spiderhunt

episodes.synopsis: Jess and Cece party all night, and Jess ends up spending the night with Bearclaw. Coach is embarrassed to introduce Nick and Winston to May.
episodes.title: Walk of Shame

episodes.synopsis: Jess attends the memorial of a guy she barely knew, Schmidt tries to get his bar mitzvah money from his mother, and Winston wants to befriend Aly.
episodes.title: The Right Thing

episodes.synopsis: Jess tries to get new computers for the school by schmoozing with politicians at a charity event. Winston falls for an activist who dislikes police.
episodes.title: Par 5

episodes.synopsis: Jess tries to doctor Coach and May's relationship as they hit a monumental hurdle. Schmidt agrees to take the blame for Fawn's political mishap.
episodes.title: Panty Gate

episodes.synopsis: Hoping for a fresh start, Schmidt discards mementos of Cece, while Jess and Nick reevaluate their relationship and Coach decides to move in with May.
episodes.title: Clean Break
